Title: Clean and Sober
Plot: In Los Angeles, Dawson visits Audrey at the rehab clinic where he spots a big time film producer, named Toni Stark, and follows her into a therapy session hoping to talk to the woman who will direct Dawson to better contacts.  Meanwhile in Boston, Pacey throws a party at his place to celebrate his new success at his job as well as purchasing a new super-sized TV set and is surprised when Joey, still sulking over the departure of Eddie, lets loose by getting drunk and setting up a spontaneous gam
GuestStars: Esteban Powell, Dean Mumford, Dino Muccio, Adrian Monte, Keith Harris, Dan Hurlbutt, Elaine Halee, Alicia Coppola
